title: CURSING, Not Allowed
body_text:
In this week's attraction, 19 year-old powerhouse
Dan Fitzpatrick
takes on his youngest sibling, the gutsy and resilient
Eamon Fitzpatrick
. The family fun
EastCoastDodgeball
has experienced over the last several months hasn't ceased quite yet!
And to think all it took was one mailed invitation.
Come on over to Wall High School on August 23 for this rare "Brother vs. Brother" confrontation!
body_html:
In this week's attraction, 19 year-old powerhouse Dan Fitzpatrick takes on his youngest sibling, the gutsy and resilient Eamon Fitzpatrick. The family fun EastCoastDodgeball has experienced over the last several months hasn't ceased quite yet!

And to think all it took was one mailed invitation.

Come on over to Wall High School on August 23 for this rare "Brother vs. Brother" confrontation!
